introduction: ABC has put in development Invisible, a thriller drama from Hand of God creator Ben Watkins, Rashad Raisani (The Gifted) and 20th Century Fox TV, where Raisani is under an overall deal.Written and executive produced by the Burn Notice duo of Watkins and Raisani, Invisible is described as a sexy, high-octane thriller about an undercover federal agent going through an identity crisis as she struggles to find balance between her roles as a wife and mother and her calling as a high risk law enforcement officer. 20th Century Fox is the studio.
